summary: Kevin, Sam and Rob are founding members of a theoretical group which pulls off heists. Leo, a gangster, blackmails them into pulling off a real multi-million dollar heist. Now it's up to them to get out alive.
cast: Ryan Reynolds|Kristin Booth|Joris Jarsky|Sean Sullivan|Tara Slone|Soo Garay|William House|Wai Choy|James Allodi|Mif|Duff MacDonald|David Suchet|David Hewlett|Laura Catalano|Philip Craig|Allen Zarnett|Ho Chow|Leford Lawes
title: Infalible
